Name: Raspberry
Description: An extremely tart berry that has a warm glow.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una baya extremadamente agria con un brillo cálido.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine säuerliche Beere, die einen warmen Abgang hat.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une baie extrêmement acide qui a une lueur chaude.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egy igen savanyú bogyó, mely melegséget áraszt.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 赤く輝くとても酸っぱいベリー。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma baga extremamente azeda que tem um brilho quente.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一种极酸的浆果，它散发着一种温暖的光泽。
